name: Hannah
role: Hufflepuff student in Harry Potter's year, prefect of Hufflepuff house in fifth year, member of Dumbledore's Army

name: Ludo
role: Head of the Department of Magical Games and Sports within the Ministry of Magic

name: Bathilda
role: author of A History of Magic, great aunt of Gellert Grindelwald.

name: Katie
role: Gryffindor student one year above Harry Potter; Chaser on the Gryffindor Quidditch team.

name: Cuthbert
role: ghost, History of Magic professor.

name: Phineas Nigellus
role: great-great-grandfather of Sirius Black and former headmaster of Hogwarts, whose painting hangs in the office and helps out the current headmaster.

name: Sirius
role: Harry Potter's godfather, a member of the Order of the Phoenix and prisoner on the run.

name: Amelia
role: Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement, aunt of Susan Bones.

name: Susan
role: Hufflepuff student in Harry's year, a member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Terry
role: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year, a member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Lavender
role: Gryffindor student in Harry's year, a member of Dumbledore's Army, briefly Ron Weasley's girlfriend.

name: Millicent
role: Slytherin student in Harry's year, a member of Umbridge's Inquisitorial Squad.

name: Charity
role: Professor of Muggle Studies at Hogwarts during Harry's time at school.

name: Frank
role: Muggle gardener for the Riddle family.

name: Alecto
role: sister of Amycus Carrow, Death Eater and professor of Muggle Studies for one year, Deputy Headmistress of Hogwarts under Severus Snape

name: Amycus
role: brother of Alecto Carrow, Death Eater and professor of Defence Against the Dark Arts for one year and Deputy Headmaster of Hogwarts under Severus Snape

name: Reginald
role: employee of the Magical Maintenance Department for the Ministry of Magic, impersonated by Ron Weasley

name: Mary
role: Muggle-born wife of Reginald Cattermole, saved by Harry Potter from the Muggle-born Registration Commission.

name: Cho
role: Ravenclaw student one year above Harry, Quidditch Seeker, member of Dumbledore's Army and Harry's first love interest.

name: Penelope
role: Ravenclaw prefect and girlfriend of Percy Weasley
Matron of the orphanage where Tom Marvolo Riddle lived

name: Michael
role: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year, member of Dumbledore's Army, Ginny Weasley's first boyfriend

name: Vincent
role: Slytherin student in Harry's year, son of Death Eater, Slytherin Quidditch team Beater, a member of the Inquisitorial Squad, a friend of Draco Malfoy.

name: Colin
role: Muggle-born Gryffindor student one year below Harry, brother of Dennis Creevey, member of Dumbledore's Army, killed during the Battle of Hogwarts, after sneaking away from the younger evacuated students in the seventh book

name: Dennis
role: Muggle-born Gryffindor student three years below Harry, brother of Colin Creevey,and member of Dumbledore's Army

name: Dirk
role: Muggle-born Head of the Goblin Liaison Office, went on the run in Deathly Hallows with fellow muggle-born Ted Tonks, Dean Thomas and goblins Gornuk and Griphook

name: Bartemius
role: Death Eater, credited with facilitating the return of Lord Voldemort, received a Dementor's Kiss, used Polyjuice Potion to impersonate Alastor Moody

name: Roger
role: Ravenclaw student who was Captain and Chaser on the Ravenclaw Quidditch team. Went to Yule Ball with Fleur Delacour.
an Auror

name: Fleur
role: French student who participated in the Triwizard Tournament representing Beauxbatons, later married Bill Weasley.

name: Gabrielle
role: younger sister of Fleur Delacour, saved by Harry in the Triwizard Tournament

name: Dedalus
role: member of the Order of the Phoenix who took the Dursleys into hiding

name: Amos
role: works for the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures, father of Cedric Diggory

name: Cedric
role: Hufflepuff student two years above Harry, school prefect, Quidditch Seeker and captain, co-winner of the Triwizard Tournament

name: Elphias
role: School friend of Albus Dumbledore

name: Antonin
role: Death Eater who killed Fabian Prewett, Gideon Prewett, and Remus Lupin.

name: Aberforth
role: Brother of Albus and Ariana Dumbledore, owner of the Hog's Head

name: Albus
role: Hogwarts Headmaster in Harry Potter's time, Transfiguration professor in Tom Riddle's time, founder of the Order of the Phoenix.

name: Dudley
role: Muggle son of Vernon Dursley and Petunia Evans, first cousin of Harry Potter

name: Marjorie
role: Muggle sister of Vernon Dursley, breeds bulldogs, her favourite one named Ripper.

name: Petunia
role: Harry's aunt, the sister of his mother Lily. Married to Vernon Dursley and mother of Dudley Dursley

name: Vernon
role: Harry Potter's muggle uncle, married to his aunt Petunia and father of Dudley Dursley.

name: Marietta
role: Ravenclaw student one year above Harry, member of Dumbledore's Army

name: Arabella
role: Squib neighbour of the Dursleys', member of the Order of the Phoenix.

name: Argus
role: Squib caretaker of Hogwarts

name: Justin
role: Muggle-born Hufflepuff student in Harry's year, a member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Seamus
role: Irish Gryffindor student in Harry's year, a member of Dumbledore's Army, best friend of Dean Thomas.

name: Marcus
role: Slytherin sixth year Quidditch captain

name: Mundungus
role: Common thief and shifty member of the Order of the Phoenix

name: Filius
role: Charms professor at Hogwarts and Head of Ravenclaw

name: Florean
role: Ice cream vendor at Diagon Alley, supplied free ice creams to Harry, kidnapped and killed by Death Eaters

name: Cornelius
role: Minister for Magic in the first five books, sacked when he denied Lord Voldemort's return for a year.

name: Marvolo
role: Pure-blood Father of Merope and Morfin Gaunt, grandfather of Tom Marvolo Riddle.

name: Merope
role: The mother of Tom Marvolo Riddle/Lord Voldemort, died after childbirth.

name: Morfin
role: Son of Marvolo Gaunt, brother of Merope Gaunt, uncle of Tom Marvolo Riddle, framed by his nephew for Muggle killings.

name: Anthony
role: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year, member of Dumbledore's Army

name: Gregory
role: Slytherin student in Harry's year, Slytherin Quidditch Beater, a member of the Inquisitorial Squad.

name: Hermione
role: Muggle-born Gryffindor student in Harry's year, one of Harry's best friends, founder of Dumbledore's Army, Gryffindor Prefect.

name: Astoria
role: Wife to Draco and mother to Scorpius Malfoy. She mysteriously dies in Harry Potter and the Cursed Child, which leaves her son greatly depressed at Hogwarts.
highly regarded East European wand-maker.

name: Fenrir
role: Werewolf working for the Death-eaters

name: Gellert
role: Dark Wizard, jailed since Albus Dumbledore defeated him in the 1940s.

name: Wilhelmina
role: Substitute Care of Magical Creatures professor during Harry's fourth year.

name: Godric
role: Founder of Gryffindor, owned and enchanted the Sorting Hat.

name: Rubeus
role: Half-giant Keeper of Keys and Grounds at Hogwarts, Care of Magical Creatures professor starting from Harry's third year, a member of the Order of the Phoenix. Once a Hogwarts student, Hagrid was expelled in his third year.
Hogwarts flying instructor, Quidditch referee

name: Mafalda
role: Witch who works in the Ministry of Magic, impersonated by Hermione Granger in Deathly Hallows.

name: Helga
role: Founder of Hufflepuff.

name: Lee
role: Gryffindor student two years above Harry, Hogwarts Quidditch commentator, good friend of Fred and George Weasley at Hogwarts

name: Bertha
role: witch from the Ministry of Magic who was murdered by Voldemort.

name: Igor
role: Reformed Death Eater, Headmaster of Durmstrang.

name: Viktor
role: Durmstrang student, Bulgarian Quidditch Seeker, participated in the Triwizard Tournament.

name: Bellatrix
role: Death Eater who tortured Frank and Alice Longbottom into insanity.

name: Rabastan
role: Death Eater, brother of Rodolphus Lestrange

name: Rodolphus
role: Death Eater, brother of Rabastan Lestrange, husband of Bellatrix Lestrange

name: Gilderoy
role: Fraudulent celebrity author, Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher.

name: Alice
role: Wife of Frank Longbottom, mother of Neville Longbottom, member of the original Order of the Phoenix, Auror, tortured into insanity by Bellatrix Lestrange along with her husband

name: Augusta
role: Mother of Frank Longbottom and grandmother of Neville Longbottom

name: Frank
role: Father of Neville Longbottom, a member of the original Order of the Phoenix, Auror, tortured into insanity by Bellatrix Lestrange along with his wife.

name: Neville
role: Gryffindor student in Harry's year, a member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Luna
role: Ravenclaw student one year below Harry, a member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Xenophilius
role: Father of Luna Lovegood, and editor of The Quibbler.

name: Remus
role: Gryffindor student before Harry's time, a friend of James Potter, werewolf, Professor of Defence Against the Dark Arts in Harry's third year, and member of the Order of the Phoenix.

name: Edward Remus
role: Son of Remus Lupin and Nymphadora Tonks. Hufflepuff student. Also known as Teddy Lupin.

name: Walden
role: The Committee of Disposal of Dangerous Creatures's executioner, also a Death-Eater

name: Draco
role: Slytherin student in Harry's year, Slytherin Quidditch Seeker, school prefect, member of the Inquisitorial Squad.

name: Lucius
role: Draco Malfoy's father, an influential Death-Eater, and, early in the series, governor of Hogwarts

name: Narcissa
role: Lucius Malfoy's wife and Draco Malfoy's mother, sister of Bellatrix Lestrange and Andromeda Tonks.

name: Scorpius
role: Son of Draco Malfoy and Astoria Greengrass, friend of Albus Potter.

name: Madam
role: Clothes shop owner at Diagon Alley

name: Griselda
role: Governor of the Wizarding Examinations Authority which ran the O.W.L, N.E.W.T., and W.O.M.B.A.T. exams, Wizengamot elder

name: Madam
role: An old lady travelling on the knight bus in the summer of 1993.She was heading for Abergavanny looking quite ill.

name: Olympe
role: Half-giantess, Headmistress of Beauxbatons

name: Ernie
role: Hufflepuff student in Harry's year, school prefect, member of Dumbledore's Army

name: Minerva
role: Hogwarts Transfiguration professor, Head of Gryffindor House, Deputy Headmistress of Hogwarts, a member of the Order of the Phoenix.

name: Cormac
role: Gryffindor student one year above Harry Potter,in love with Hermione Granger member of the Slug Club and went with Hermione to the Slug Club Christmas Party

name: Graham
role: Slytherin student who played Chaser on the Slytherin Quidditch Team

name: Alastor
role: Retired Auror, member of the Order of the Phoenix, impersonated by Barty Crouch Jr. in 'The Goblet of Fire'

name: Auntie
role: Ron Weasley's old aunt.

name: Theodore
role: A Slytherin student in the same year as Harry Potter. Theadore Nott is one of the few students who can see Thestrals, suggesting that he has witnessed a death at some point. His father is a Death Eater and described as an elderly widower.

name: Bob
role: Wizard in the Department of Magical Law Enforcement, led the Magical Law Enforcement Squad in the 1920s. He went to the Gaunts' home after Morfin Gaunt used magic in front a muggle and subsequently turned the Gaunts over to the Wizengamot.

name: Garrick
role: Wandmaker, owner of the Ollivanders shop.

name: Pansy
role: Slytherin student in Harry's year, school prefect, a member of the Inquisitorial Squad, Draco Malfoy's girlfriend for some time.

name: Padma
role: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year, identical twin sister of Gryffindor Parvati Patil, a member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Parvati
role: Gryffindor student in Harry's year, identical twin sister of Ravenclaw Padma Patil, a member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Peter
role: Former school friend of James Potter, Sirius Black and Remus Lupin. Betrays James and Lily Potter. Death Eater, an unregistered animagus, Pettigrew is first introduced as a rat known as Scabbers.

name: Antioch
role: Original owner of The Elder Wand in The Tale of the Three Brothers.

name: Cadmus
role: Original owner of The Resurrection Stone in The Tale of the Three Brothers

name: Ignotus
role: Original owner of The Invisibility Cloak in The Tale of the Three Brothers.

name: Irma
role: Hogwarts librarian

name: Sturgis
role: Member of the Order of the Phoenix, imprisoned in Azkaban

name: Poppy
role: Hogwarts school nurse

name: Harry
role: The main character of the series, orphaned son of James Potter and Lily Evans and student at Hogwarts

name: James
role: Harry Potter's father, a member of the Order of the Phoenix, murdered by Lord Voldemort before the series begins.

name: Lily
role: Harry Potter's mother, a member of the Order of the Phoenix, murdered by Lord Voldemort before the series begins.

name: Quirinus
role: Defence Against the Dark Arts professor in Harry's first year, possessed by Lord Voldemort, and was killed in Philosopher's Stone.

name: Helena
role: Daughter of Rowena Ravenclaw, stole her mother's diadem and hid it, killed by the Bloody Baron and became Ravenclaw's house ghost.

name: Rowena
role: Founder of Ravenclaw, mother of Helena Ravenclaw

name: Tom
role: see Lord Voldemort.

name: Demelza
role: a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, sorted into Gryffindor House. She was a Chaser for the Gryffindor Quidditch team, and was noted to be particularly skilled at dodging Bludgers.

name: Augustus
role: Death Eater, spy working in the Department of Mysteries

name: Albert
role: was a Ministry of Magic employee of high rank during the administration under Pius Thicknesse. His chief function was an investigator of alleged Muggle-borns.

name: Newt
role: Author of "Fantastic Beasts and Where To Find Them".Was a hufflepuff and great with making cures for different sicknesses.

name: Rufus
role: Head of the Auror Office, replaces Cornelius Fudge as Minister for Magic.

name: Kingsley
role: Auror, replaces Pius Thicknesse as Minister for Magic, member of the Order of the Phoenix

name: Stanley
role: Conductor of the Knight Bus, later jailed in Azkaban on suspicions of being a death-eater.

name: Aurora
role: Professor and member of the Astronomy Department at Hogwarts, a witch with dark skin, hair, and eyes.

name: Rita
role: Reporter for the Daily Prophet, author of The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore, unregistered animagus.

name: Horace
role: Former Potions professor at Hogwarts and Head of Slytherin House who taught Tom Marvolo Riddle and returns to Hogwarts in Harry's sixth year.

name: Salazar
role: Founder of Slytherin, creator of the Chamber of Secrets.

name: Hepzibah
role: Elderly, wealthy antique collector, descendant of Helga Hufflepuff, murdered and robbed by Tom Marvolo Riddle

name: Zacharias
role: Hufflepuff student, a member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Severus
role: Hogwarts, Potions and later Defence Against the Dark Arts professor, Head of Slytherin House, a member of both the Death Eaters and the Order of the Phoenix to spy for Dumbledore.

name: Alicia
role: Chaser on the Gryffindor Quidditch team, two years above Harry Potter at Hogwarts. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Pomona
role: Hogwarts Herbology professor, Head of Hufflepuff House.

name: Pius
role: Minister for Magic while under the Imperius Curse, later replaced by Kingsley Shacklebolt.

name: Dean
role: Gryffindor student in Harry's year, a member of Dumbledore's Army, briefly Ginny Weasley's boyfriend, Gryffindor Quidditch Chaser.

name: Andromeda
role: Sister of Bellatrix Lestrange and Narcissa Malfoy, disowned by her family for marrying Muggle-born Ted Tonks, mother of Nymphadora Tonks.

name: Nymphadora
role: Daughter of Ted and Andromeda Tonks, Auror and member of the Order of the Phoenix. She marries Remus Lupin, and become the mother of Teddy Lupin.

name: Ted
role: Muggle-born husband of Andromeda and father of Nymphadora Tonks.
was a wizard and a Death Eater. Escaped from Azkaban after Lord Voldemort's return.

name: Sybill
role: Hogwarts Divination professor, predicted the prophecy that prompted Lord Voldemort to go after the Potters

name: Wilky
role: The apparition instructor in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

name: Dolores Jane
role: Senior Undersecretary to the Minister for Magic, Defence Against the Dark Arts professor, Hogwarts High Inquisitor, Headmistress of Hogwarts, who enthusiastically joins in the persecution of half-bloods under Voldemort.

name: Emmeline
role: a member of the party that brings Harry to Grimmauld Place, a member of the Order of the Phoenix. Described as "A stately looking witch in an emerald green shawl".

name: Romilda
role: Hogwarts student who tried to romance Harry with Chocolate Cauldrons containing a love potion from Weasley's Wizard Wheezes

name: Septima
role: Arithmancy professor at Hogwarts.

name: Angelina
role: Gryffindor student two years above Harry, Quidditch Chaser and later captain.

name: Myrtle Elizabeth
role: Known as Moaning Myrtle the ghost haunting the girls washroom on the first floor and prefects washroom.She was a Ravenclaw student and killed in the girls washrooms by a basilisk at age fourteen.

name: Arthur
role: Muggle-obsessed Ministry of Magic employee. Husband of Molly Weasley, father of Bill, Charlie, Percy, Fred, George, Ron, and Ginny Weasley, member of the Order of the Phoenix

name: Bill
role: Oldest son of Arthur and Molly Weasley, Gringotts employee, marries Fleur Delacour.

name: Charlie
role: Second son of Arthur and Molly Weasley, and a member of the Order of the Phoenix, works with dragons in Romania.

name: Fred
role: Son of Arthur and Molly Weasley and identical twin brother of George Weasley, a member of Dumbledore's Army, Gryffindor Quidditch Beater, co-owner of Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes, killed in an explosion caused by Augustus Rookwood in the Battle of Hogwarts.

name: George
role: Son of Arthur and Molly Weasley and identical twin brother of Fred Weasley, member of Dumbledore's Army, Gryffindor Quidditch Beater, co-owner of Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes.

name: Ginny
role: Only daughter and youngest child of Arthur and Molly Weasley, Gryffindor student one year under Harry, Gryffindor Quidditch Seeker and Chaser, a member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Hugo
role: Son of Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger.

name: Molly
role: Wife of Arthur Weasley, mother of Bill, Charlie, Percy, Fred, George, Ron and Ginny Weasley, a member of the Order of the Phoenix.

name: Percy
role: Third son of Arthur and Molly Weasley, Gryffindor prefect and Head Boy then Ministry of Magic employee, long estranged from his family before joining them against the Death Eaters in Deathly Hallows,

name: Ron
role: Best friends with Harry Potter and Hermione Granger, youngest Son of Arthur and Molly Weasley, Gryffindor Quidditch Keeper, school prefect, a member of Dumbledore's Army

name: Rose
role: Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger's daughter.

name: Oliver
role: Hogwarts student, Gryffindor Quidditch Keeper and captain.
Death Eater, Head of Magical Law Enforcement under Voldemort's regime.

name: Blaise
role: Slytherin student in Harry's year, friends with Draco Malfoy.

name: Aragog
role: Giant spider raised by Rubeus Hagrid, lives in the Forbidden Forest.

name: Bane
role: Centaur, not very wizard-friendly.
Author of several Wizarding fairy tales, including The Tale of the Three Brothers
Slytherin House ghost, suitor and killer of Helena Ravenclaw, killed himself in remorse
Goblin, Bank teller at Gringotts Wizarding Bank. Put under the Imperius curse when Harry, Ron, and Hermione broke into Gringotts.

name: Buckbeak
role: Hippogriff belonging at various times to Rubeus Hagrid, Sirius Black and Harry Potter
Armoured and somewhat mad knight occupying a painting in Hogwarts

name: Crookshanks
role: Intelligent cat belonging to Hermione Granger.

name: Dobby
role: House-elf originally belonging to the Malfoy family, which Harry helps set free in Chamber of Secrets. He becomes the only paid house-elf at Hogwarts.

name: Errol
role: Owl belonging to the Weasley family.

name: Fang
role: Boarhound belonging to Rubeus Hagrid.
Hufflepuff House ghost.
Witch in the painting that conceals the entrance to the Gryffindor common room.

name: Fawkes
role: Phoenix belonging to Albus Dumbledore, saved Harry Potter from Basilisk in the Chamber of Secrets.

name: Firenze
role: Centaur, professor of Divination at Hogwarts.

name: Fluffy
role: Three-headed dog belonging to Rubeus Hagrid, protector of the Philosopher's Stone.

name: Gornuk
role: A goblin like Griphook who worked at Gringotts and later teamed up with Griphook,Dean Thomas,Ted Tonks,and Dirk Cresswell to hide away during 'The Deathly Hallows'

name: Grawp
role: Giant, half-brother of Rubeus Hagrid

name: Griphook
role: Goblin, works at Gringotts Bank which he helps Harry and his friends steal the cup from within the Lestrange vault.

name: Hedwig
role: Harry Potter's pet owl

name: Hokey
role: House-elf belonging to Hepzibah Smith

name: Kreacher
role: House-elf belonging to the Black family, and later Harry Potter. Though at first preferring to serve the pureblood line (including Regulus Black, Narcissa Malfoy, Bellatrix Lestrange, and Draco Malfoy), he eventually likes serving under Harry as he treats him better.

name: Magorian
role: Centaur.

name: Muriel
role: Great aunt of the Weasley children

name: Nagini
role: Lord Voldemort's giant pet snake, which does his bidding.She is one of Voldemort's Horcruxes.

name: Nick
role: Sir Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington, the Gryffindor House ghost.He is known for being nearly headless.

name: Norbert
role: Dragon belonging to Rubeus Hagrid, later secretly moved to the Dragon Reserve in Romania by friends of Charlie Weasley.
An evil red eyed Cat belonging to Argus Filch the caretaker,Mrs. Norris sneakes around at night looking for out of bed students

name: Peeves
role: Hogwarts poltergeist, a mischievous magical being.

name: Pigwidgeon
role: Named by Ginny Weasley, a tiny mischievous Owl belonging to Ron Weasley.

name: Rosmerta
role: Proprietor of the Three Broomsticks in Hogsmeade

name: Ronan
role: Centaur living in the Forbidden Forest

name: Scabbers
role: Ron Weasley's pet rat in the first three stories. He is revealed at the end of Prisoner of Azkaban to be a wizard in animal form: Peter Pettigrew.

name: Scabior
role: Snatcher who captures Harry Potter, Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger in Deathly Hallows.

name: Travers
role: was a wizard and a Death Eater who escaped from Azkaban after Lord Voldemort's return.

name: Trevor
role: The toad belonging to Neville Longbottom that always gets lost

name: Winky
role: A female house elf who originally belonged to Bartemius Crouch Sr., but was sacked by him when evidence emerged that she had used magic at The Quidditch World Cup, then worked in the Hogwarts kitchen.
